content.question: Frank Lloyd Wrightâ€™s Fallingwater demonstrates his conviction that this building should

choices.label: be an integrative part of the landscape
elevate the individual above worldly concerns

content.answer: be an integrative part of the landscape

topic.text: 4.3: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
